name: Ride the Gauntlet
description:
Ride the Gauntlet is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shoot 'em up. The player controls a futuristic car that must navigate the treacherous bends of a sky bridge high above the city, shooting enemies and collecting coins as they go.

This fully playable prototype features one level with a boss at the end.

It's my first game and was built using the Godot Engine. I did all the design, programming, art, music and sound effects except for the title art which Rebel_Slasher kindly contributed. Inspirations include Road Fighter (Konami, 1984) and OutRun 2019 (Sega, 1993).
